    • Constructor Detail

      • Sale

        public Sale(DatabaseInterface posDatabase)
        Sale constructor that passes in a reference to a database object. Creates a new list of items in the sale also stores the max saleID from the database.
        Parameters:
        posDatabase - is a reference to the database connection, this gives the sale access to interacting with the database
